articles.title: Partial lunar eclipse, longest since nearly 600 years ago, to combine with next full moon - KTLA Los Angeles
articles.description: The longest partial lunar eclipse in centuries is set to coincide with next week’s full moon, in an hourslong event that will be visible across North America and many other parts of the world. The Beaver Moon is expected to reach its peak next Friday at 1 a.m…
articles.content:

articles.title: Jury instructions will be next key moment in Kyle Rittenhouse trial - Global News
articles.description: Jurors will soon begin deliberating in a case that left Americans divided over whether Kyle Rittenhouse was a patriot or a vigilante.
articles.content:
Prosecutors and defense attorneys for Kyle Rittenhouse will return to the courthouse without the jury present on Friday to finalize how jurors will be instructed when they get the case next week.

articles.title: Brazil becomes first South American team to qualify for 2022 World Cup - The Star Online
articles.description: SAO PAULO (Reuters) -     Brazil beat Colombia 1-0 in a World Cup qualifier in Sao Paulo on Thursday to become the first South American team to qualify for Qatar 2022.

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Aston Villa appoint Liverpool legend Gerrard as new manager as he leaves Rangers - Goal.com
articles.description: Lionel Messi's Argentina and Neymar's Brazil are leading South American qualifying for the 2022 FIFA World Cup. The top four qualify directly and the fifth-place team will advance to a playoff.
